plugin.name: winshadows
plugin._long: Server Side Shadows for windows on Wayfire

option.name: enabled_views
option._short: Decoration enabled for specified window types
option._long: Enables window shadows for windows matching the specified criteria.

option.name: include_undecorated_views
option._short: Include windows that have their own decoration
option._long: Enables window shadows on windows that do not request server side decoration.

option.name: shadow_emissiveness
option._long: Controls the blending of the shadow, 0 is normal blending, 1 is additive. Set to 0 for shadows and between 0 and 1 for glow effects.

option.name: shadow_radius
option._long: Sets the shadow radius in pixels.

option.name: clip_shadow_inside
option._long: Does not render the shadow within the rectangular bounds of a window, may look bad on rounded corners.
